example.name: passive
example.text: CFCs are the primary ingredient in a gas , often referred to [*] by the Du Pont trade name Freon , which [*T*-2] is compressed [*-1] to liquid form [*] to serve as the cooling agent in refrigeration and air-conditioning equipment .
